testsuite.name: TicTacToeTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
No fields found
Below you can see the output of your program during this test Notice, that '>' symbol means the start of the input:
--------- | ? ? ? | | ? ? ? | | ? ? ? | --------- Enter the coordinates: >3 3 --------- | ? ? X | | ? ? ? | | ? ? ? | --------- Enter the coordinates: >2 2 --------- | ? ? X | | ? O ? | | ? ? ? | --------- Enter the coordinates: >4 1 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! Enter the coordinates: >3 1 --------- | ? ? X | | ? O ? | | ? ? X | --------- Enter the coordinates: >1 3 --------- | O ? X | | ? O ? | | ? ? X | --------- Enter the coordinates: >4 3 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! Enter the coordinates: >4 4 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! Enter the coordinates: >3 1 This cell is occupied! Choose another one! Enter the coordinates: >4 4 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! Enter the coordinates: >4 3 Coordinates should be from 1 to 3! Enter the coordinates: >1 1 --------- | O ? X | | ? O ? | | X ? X | --------- Enter the coordinates: >1 2 --------- | O ? X | | O O ? | | X ? X | --------- Enter the coordinates: >1 3 This cell is occupied! Choose another one! Enter the coordinates: >2 1 --------- | O ? X | | O O ? | | X X X | --------- X wins
